events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on the highway, requesting claim initiation due to extensive damage to the car.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing initial accident details and keywords indicating vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent specializing in auto accident cases has been assigned to manage the customer's claim effectively.
Acknowledged receipt of the claim and informed the customer that the investigation process will begin shortly.
Requested the customer to submit all relevant documents including vehicle registration, accident photos, and police report.
Customer has submitted all the requested documents promptly, including the accident report and detailed photographs of the car damage.
The investigation into the vehicle collision has started, involving review of damage and policy coverage verification.
Investigation concluded with findings supporting the claim validity and determined the extent of repair covered by the policy.
A settlement offer based on repair estimates and policy limits has been proposed to the customer for approval.
Customer has acknowledged the proposed settlement positively and requested prompt processing of the payment.
The claim has been formally approved after all criteria and customer acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment has been issued to the customer for the approved settlement amount to cover vehicle repairs.
The claim has been officially closed following successful payment and customer satisfaction with the settlement outcome.
